channel.title: #####EDITing The interface #####
channel.description:
I have many emotes on my server that have been converted to tele commands eg. "home" "jad"
How can i edit where these tele you to!?!
I want to make emote Id 165 into "PK" and tele it to my pk area but i cant find it in client, graphics handler , menu handler...
Where is it?

item.title: #####EDITing The interface #####
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

Thanks… i just found it in TextHandler

Read full topic

item.title: #####EDITing The interface #####
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Search for “Home”…

For the second question search for “Case 165:”
Work the rest out yourself.

Read full topic
